Gap Filling¶

tstoolkit.gap_filling module¶

class tstoolkit.gap_filling.TimeSeriesGapFiller(seasonal_periods: int = 60)¶

Bases: object

A class for Filling Gaps in Time Series data.

Parameters:

seasonal_periods (int, optional) – The number of periods in a complete seasonal cycle, e.g. 4 for quarterly data or 7 for daily data with a weekly cycle, defaults to 60

fit(first_ts: Series, second_ts: Series) → None¶

Fitting Gap Filling Method.

Parameters:

  • first_ts (pd.Series) – Part of Time series before the gap.

  • second_ts (pd.Series) – Part of time series after the gap.

merge_ts() → Series¶

Returning a merged time series of all three parts.

Returns:

Merged Time series

Return type:

pd.Series

plot_ts() → None¶

Plot all three parts of time series combined.

predict() → Series¶

Getting the filled time series.

Returns:

Filled Time Series

Return type:

pd.Series
